title: mAnamu lEdA
sahitya:
mAnamu lEdA nAyeDa nIkabhi


anupallavi

  mAnamugaci brocina draupadI manyuDaina shrI krSNa 
mAnyulavale nApai dayajUDavu mAnitAngamuni mAnasa bhrnga 


caraNam 1    karirAjumakarijE jikki kAma janaka ApadbAndhavayani
moraliDaga viniveravukumani saragunimakaridru�ci rakSi�cina nIkabhi 
    caraNam 2    suralu kamsuni bAdha kOrvakanaraharE shrIharEyani vEDaga 
karuNacEvAni madamaNacina kalyANa guNO vEtuDaina nIkabhi
    caraNam 3    vArijAsanadula karudainaya pAra mahimagaLa shrIman nArAyana 
khagavAhana yEminErani sadAshivuni brOvarAdA nikabhi
